thread.title: Voxvalley to Unveil its Retail & Wholesale Softswitch Solutions for Carrier Community at ACC 2015
thread.title_full: Voxvalley to Unveil its Retail & Wholesale Softswitch Solutions for Carrier Community at ACC 2015 - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Voxvalley to Unveil its Retail & Wholesale Softswitch Solutions for Carrier Community at ACC 2015
text:
Voxvalley to Unveil its Retail & Wholesale Softswitch Solutions for Carrier Community at ACC 2015
Voxvalley is all set to participate and showcase its flagship VoIP solutions in Asian Carrier Conference (ACC) 2015 to be held in Philippines.
Hyderabad, India, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Voxvalley has confirmed its participation for the Asian Carriers Conference (ACC) scheduled to take place from 01 – 04 September, 2015 at Cebu, Philippines. The company is going to unveil Retail & Wholesale Softswitch Solutions for carriers attending the event from all over the world.
“This time around we have come up with VoIP solutions that would exclusively benefit both retail and wholesale carriers. Our solutions primarily include Retail & Wholesale Softswitch, Tunneling and Bandwidth Compression Software, Mobile VoIP and Client Configuration Server. Our VoIP experts will do enough to provide adequate insights on the benefits of our solutions apart from clearing all queries posed by the attendees. Definitely a win-win situation for carriers and solution providers. Looking forward to meeting the attendees at the ACC event,” said Sajjan Mallik, MD & CEO, Voxvalley Technologies.
The ACC 2015 is known to be the renowned platform for business networking opportunities for carriers, telecoms and VoIP solution providers. In view of this, Voxvalley Technologies want to leverage this platform for engaging in newer business collaborations with carriers and telecoms.
Attendees of the ACC event can stop by at Booth #B16 to meet Voxvalley’s VoIP experts and explore their wide range of VoIP solutions. Arrange a meeting now you can mail us sales@voxvalley.com or Visit - http://events.voxvalley.com/set-an-appointment/
About Voxvalley
Voxvalley Technologies is a leading VoIP solutions provider delivering pioneering VoIP solutions to Telecoms, ITSPs, ISPs, MVNEs, MVNOs and VoIP providers worldwide. With a strong client base and extensive product portfolio, the company has proficiency in crafting custom mobile and business VoIP solutions.
Under mobile VoIP, it covers robust and high-performance mobile VoIP dialers like MoSIP, MoSIP Plus and MoSIP Hybrid. While business VoIP includes smart switching solutions like Vox Switch and Vox PBX. Supplementary applications include Vox Bridge, Vox Transcoder, MoSIP C5, Vox CCS and Vox PC.
Headquartered in Singapore with R&D Center in India and sales offices in US, Middle East, Southeast Asia and India, Voxvalley caters to over 8 million end-users and 1200 direct customers from 24 countries, worldwide.
